mapper.select: SELECT service_order.id,order_id,service.service_name,address.community,address.houseNumber, service.PRICE,uName,uIphone,service_Id,service_order.CUSTOMER_ID,address_Id,sc, service_order.discount,createtime,state,flag,money,serviceTime,remark FROM service_order LEFT JOIN address ON service_order.ADDRESS_ID=address.ID LEFT JOIN service ON service.ID=service_order.SERVICE_ID WHERE createtime like "2018%" ORDER BY createtime DESC

SELECT service_order.id,order_id,service.service_name,address.community,address.houseNumber, service.PRICE,uName,uIphone,service_Id,service_order.CUSTOMER_ID,address_Id,sc, service_order.discount,createtime,state,flag,money,serviceTime,remark FROM service_order LEFT JOIN address ON service_order.ADDRESS_ID=address.ID LEFT JOIN service ON service.ID=service_order.SERVICE_ID
and address.community like '%${city}%'
and sc=1
and Sc >1
and state=#{state}

mapper.update: UPDATE service_order SET state = #{state} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT service_order.id,order_id,service.service_name,address.community,address.houseNumber, service.PRICE,uName,uIphone,service_Id,service_order.CUSTOMER_ID,address_Id,sc, service_order.discount,createtime,state,flag,money,serviceTime,remark FROM service_order LEFT JOIN address ON service_order.ADDRESS_ID=address.ID LEFT JOIN service ON service.ID=service_order.SERVICE_ID where service_order.order_id=#{orderId}
mapper.update: update service_order set appkey=#{appkey}, amount=#{amount}, result=#{result}, ticketId=#{ticketId}, payAt=#{payAt}, nonce_str=#{nonce_str}, msg=#{msg}, channel=#{channel}, sign=#{sign}, state=#{state} where order_id=#{orderId}
